value.name: LA Resident, FBI 10 Most Wanted Fugitive Shot Dead In North Carolina
value.description: Greg Alyn Carlson was shot to death in a hotel n the Raleigh-Durham area by the FBI. Dave Lopez reports. 3 More Freeway Shootings Unfold On 91 Freeway In OCThree more freeway shootings unfolded ...
